CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 5 - Right to liberty and security (Article 5-4 - Review of lawfulness of detention)
JUDGES: André Potocki;Angelika Nußberger;Carlo Ranzoni;Mārtiņš Mits;Yonko Grozev
